official_title: A bill to restore premium pay to certain employees of the Federal Aviation Administration.

summary.text: Entitles Federal air traffic controllers to payment of all premium pay regardless of whether such payment exceeds the limitation on premium pay for Federal employees.

titles.title: A bill to restore premium pay to certain employees of the Federal Aviation Administration.
